inputs.name: host
inputs.description: SSH host address or IP to connect to.

inputs.name: port
inputs.description: SSH port number for the connection.

inputs.name: passphrase
inputs.description: Passphrase to decrypt the SSH private key if protected.

inputs.name: username
inputs.description: SSH username for authentication on the remote server.

inputs.name: password
inputs.description: SSH password for authentication (use secrets for sensitive data).

inputs.name: protocol
inputs.description: IP protocol version to use. Options: "tcp" (default), "tcp4" (IPv4 only), or "tcp6" (IPv6 only).

inputs.name: sync
inputs.description: When true, executes commands synchronously across multiple hosts (one after another).

inputs.name: use_insecure_cipher
inputs.description: Enable additional legacy ciphers that might be less secure but more compatible with older systems.

inputs.name: cipher
inputs.description: Specify custom cipher algorithms for encryption. Leave empty to use secure defaults.

inputs.name: timeout
inputs.description: Maximum time to wait when establishing the SSH connection, e.g., '30s', '1m'.

inputs.name: command_timeout
inputs.description: Maximum execution time for the remote commands before terminating, e.g., '10m', '1h'.

inputs.name: key
inputs.description: Raw content of the SSH private key for authentication (use secrets for sensitive data).

inputs.name: key_path
inputs.description: Path to the SSH private key file on the runner.

inputs.name: fingerprint
inputs.description: SHA256 fingerprint of the host public key for verification to prevent MITM attacks.

inputs.name: proxy_host
inputs.description: Proxy server hostname or IP if connecting through an SSH jump host.

inputs.name: proxy_port
inputs.description: SSH port number for the proxy connection.

inputs.name: proxy_username
inputs.description: Username for authentication on the proxy server.

inputs.name: proxy_password
inputs.description: Password for authentication on the proxy server (use secrets for sensitive data).

inputs.name: proxy_protocol
inputs.description: IP protocol version for proxy. Options: "tcp" (default), "tcp4" (IPv4 only), or "tcp6" (IPv6 only).

inputs.name: proxy_passphrase
inputs.description: Passphrase to decrypt the proxy SSH private key if protected.

inputs.name: proxy_timeout
inputs.description: Maximum time to wait when establishing the proxy SSH connection, e.g., '30s', '1m'.

inputs.name: proxy_key
inputs.description: Raw content of the SSH proxy private key for authentication (use secrets for sensitive data).

inputs.name: proxy_key_path
inputs.description: Path to the SSH proxy private key file on the runner.

inputs.name: proxy_fingerprint
inputs.description: SHA256 fingerprint of the proxy host public key for verification.

inputs.name: proxy_cipher
inputs.description: Specify custom cipher algorithms for proxy connection encryption.

inputs.name: proxy_use_insecure_cipher
inputs.description: Enable additional legacy ciphers for proxy connections (less secure but more compatible).

inputs.name: script
inputs.description: Commands to execute on the remote server (inline script string).

inputs.name: script_path
inputs.description: Path to a local file containing commands to execute on the remote server.

inputs.name: envs
inputs.description: Environment variables to expose to the remote script, format: key=value,key2=value2.

inputs.name: envs_format
inputs.description: Format specification for environment variable transfer (for advanced usage).

inputs.name: debug
inputs.description: Set to true to enable verbose logging for troubleshooting connection issues.

inputs.name: allenvs
inputs.description: When true, passes all GitHub Actions environment variables to the remote script.

inputs.name: request_pty
inputs.description: Request a pseudo-terminal from the server (required for interactive commands or sudo).

inputs.name: curl_insecure
inputs.description: When true, uses the --insecure option with curl for insecure downloads.

inputs.name: capture_stdout
inputs.description: When true, captures and returns standard output from the commands as action output.

inputs.name: version
inputs.description: The version of drone-ssh to use.

outputs.name: stdout
outputs.description: Standard output of the executed commands when capture_stdout is enabled.
